description:
Located in San Diego, California, The Drakulich Firm, A Professional Law Corporation, provides exceptional advocacy and support to clients dealing with complex civil disputes arising from acts of negligence, wrongdoing, professional malpractice, unfair and unlawful business practices and more.

With an additional law office in Reno, Nevada, our law firm has become one of the most respected and prominent legal practices in our region for whistleblower and qui tam claims, product liability claims, personal injury and wrongful death, bad faith insurance, professional negligence, and business litigation and fraud. Our attorneys possess decades of combined legal experience, and we have earned a listing in the prestigious Bar Register of Preeminent LawyersTM by Martindale-Hubbell速 for our impeccable professionalism and service.

Throughout the course of our history, we have recovered hundreds of millions of dollars in total compensation for our clients while holding the responsible parties accountable for their actions. While we can make no guarantees regarding your case, we can promise to do all we can to help you face your legal challenge head-on and to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you expect and deserve.

For more information on how The Drakulich Firm, A Professional Law Corporation, can best serve your needs and assist you with securing a brighter, more financially stable future for yourself, your family or your company, you can call our office or visit our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
